headline: Some companies held off on price hikes as Trump delayed tariffs. That ends soon.
summary: Companies behind the best-known brands are sounding the alarm: Prices are going up

headline: Do Higher Prices Mean Lower Sales? Hershey Thinks It's Found the Sweet Spot
summary: The candy company believes it can alter pricing on most of its products without having a "significant effect on sales," Hershey CEO Michele Buck said.

raw.headline: Do Higher Prices Mean Lower Sales? Hershey Thinks It's Found the Sweet Spot
raw.summary: The candy company believes it can alter pricing on most of its products without having a "significant effect on sales," Hershey CEO Michele Buck said.

headline: Hershey's Q2 Beat, Guidance Update, and Margin Actions Offer Clarity on Fundamentals, Morgan Stanley Says
summary: Hershey's (HSY) Q2 beat and better-than-feared fiscal 2025 guidance cut, as well as margin recovery

headline: Hershey Q2 Earnings Top Estimates on Strong Sales Growth
summary: HSY beats Q2 estimates with 26% sales growth, but earnings slip y/y amid rising costs and heavy marketing spend.

raw.headline: Hershey Q2 Earnings Top Estimates on Strong Sales Growth

headline: Hershey’s Jolly Rancher ropes in success with move away from hard candy
summary: The 76-year-old brand, best known for its bold fruit flavors, is reporting explosive growth from innovations such as gummies and freeze-dried sweets.

raw.headline: Hershey’s Jolly Rancher ropes in success with move away from hard candy
raw.summary: The 76-year-old brand, best known for its bold fruit flavors, is reporting explosive growth from innovations such as gummies and freeze-dried sweets.

headline: Chips Are Getting Stale. How Walmart, Kroger, and Other Food Titans Are Reinventing Snacks.
summary: As sales of doughnuts, cookies, and brownies slip, healthy snacks with protein, collagen, and fiber are muscling into the market.

raw.headline: Chips Are Getting Stale. How Walmart, Kroger, and Other Food Titans Are Reinventing Snacks.
raw.summary: As sales of doughnuts, cookies, and brownies slip, healthy snacks with protein, collagen, and fiber are muscling into the market.
